item.title: Rubbish and broken bottles and deadleaves, twigs detritus, 2nd August
item.description:
I don't think the pavements have been swept or cleaned since last year, I have raised an issue before and it has been closed with no action, there are broken bottles, slip and trip hassards , we used to have a road cleaner and a regular weekly clean - now nothing, street trees and hanging very low, it must be a nightmare for anyone partially sighted. Please can you clean te streets round here
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Orchard Road, Widmore, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The owners of 186 have fly tipped again. This time a fridge and mattress blocking pedestrian access at a very dangerous junction., 2nd August
item.description:
The owners of 186 have fly tipped again. This time a fridge and mattress blocking pedestrian access at a very dangerous junction. Items have been on the pavement for two days.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, Seymour Villas, Anerley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Little fox that is dead lying on the grass in public area, 2nd August
item.description:
A young fox is lying on the grass deceased. It is over the road from Burgess Park on the grass area opposite. It is near the road side. I don't know if it has been hit by a vehicle or came to an end some other way.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Surrey Canal Walk, Old Kent Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown tree obscuring zebra crossing, 2nd August
item.description:
I have reported this a number of times and each time you close it down and say it is done IT IS NoT DONE AND IT IS A H&S issue, the tree is between 40 and 42 Orchard road
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Orchard Road, Widmore, London

item.title: Miscellaneous large items on and by cycle shelter, 2nd August
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Grove Lane, Camberwell, London

item.title: Mobile bike repair unit, 2nd August
item.description:
It would appear that an informal mobile motorcycle repair unit is in operation 7 days a week beside the bridge, unfortunately outside the allotment gardens. Noise pollution very unpleasant for locals residents.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Fielding Street, Walworth, London
